abstract: Proposed contract at Ford with the United Automobile Workers union appears nearly certain to be ratified after receiving a wave of support.
snippet: A proposed contract with the United Automobile Workers initially drew strong opposition because of a lack of a wage increase.
lead_paragraph: A proposed contract with the United Automobile Workers initially drew strong opposition because of a lack of a wage increase.

headline.main: Ratification of Ford Pact by U.A.W. Seems Likely
headline.print_headline: Ratification Of Ford Pact By U.A.W. Seems Likely
headline.seo: Ford-U.A.W. Pact Appears Headed for Ratification
